title: Active Inference for AI Alignment
description: Using Active Inference principles to design aligned artificial intelligence systems.
learning_objectives: Understand AI alignment through Active Inference lens

content.overview: AI alignment seeks to ensure that artificial intelligence systems pursue goals that are beneficial to humanity. Active Inference provides a principled framework for building AI systems that learn and pursue human values while maintaining safety and interpretability.

alignment_challenges.specification_problem: How to specify what we want AI to do
alignment_challenges.robustness_problem: How AI remains safe under uncertainty
alignment_challenges.interpretability_problem: How to understand AI decision making

preference_learning.uncertainty_sampling: Query examples that reduce uncertainty most

safety_mechanisms.value_drift_detection: Monitor for changes in learned values

examples.safety: Conservative behavior when uncertain about values
